notes: All students in preschool through sixth grade required to wear masks indoors. Students in grades 7-12 "strongly encouraged" to wear masks. All staff will wear masks indoors. More information

mask policy: "allow local school leaders to determine their masking policies"
notes: The Archdiocese has 35 schools in nine counties. It said local school leaders will decide on a mask policy and will follow local health guidance. Check with your specific school for their policy.

mask policy: mixed
notes: All students in child development centers, elementary and preschool-8th grade schools required to wear masks. Masks strongly encouraged for all students at middle and high schools. mask policy: county health department said required as of 8/9
notes: The Boulder County Public Health Department will require all students ages 2 and up as well as teachers and staff in the school district to wear masks when inside a building, regardless of vaccination status. More information

mask policy: Optional/not required  7/27 -- Fully vaccinated people can go without masks in 27J Schools and properties.
notes: Masks are recommended but not required for unvaccinated students or adults over the age of 12. More information
